title: eppOdhu viDudhalaiyO
sahitya:
eppOdu viDudalaiyO veLLi himayattil viLangiDum umai maruvum shivanE



anupallavi



muppurangaLai shiru muruvalAl erittOnE muyalgaL sheukkinai muTrilum

azhittOnE



caraNam



nAma rasaminrit-tAmasa mAyaiyil nATkaLai shUdADi naliyavO nAn

pirandEn

kAmanai eri neTrik-kaNNai tirandenaik-kaTTiya taLaigaLaic-cuTTerippAi

paranE
